ISSUE.TITLE: Specify security context for procMount
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature request description Add feature parity with `podman run --security-opt=unmask=/proc/*` to `podman play kube` for procMount security opts. This is necessary for podman in podman containers which fork (things like bazel) to work properly Related to https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/19440#issuecomment-1707890917 ### Suggest potential solution ``` securityContext: procMount: "Unmasked" ``` ### Have you considered any alternatives? `podman run` works however YML is generally cleaner to use ### Additional context Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
